long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the Extension: Download and install the Community-Powered Product Recommender extension from our official website or the browser extension store.

Browse as Usual: Shop on your favorite e-commerce websites as you normally would.

Get Recommendations: As you browse, the extension will provide you with a curated list of products, recommended by a community of shoppers who have similar tastes and preferences.

Make Informed Decisions: Use these recommendations to make your shopping easier, faster, and more personalized.

Contribute: Optionally, contribute your own recommendations to help the community.

System Requirements:
Compatible with all major web browsers including Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.
Requires minimal system resources.
Privacy Policy:
We take your privacy seriously. All data is encrypted and anonymized to protect your personal information. For more details, please read our full privacy policy on our website.
